product_overview: Isacar.io is a comprehensive finance management platform offering complete financial management capabilities including transactions, budgets, recurring bills, and detailed analytics with an intuitive, inline editable interface and strong offline support.
core_goals: Enable users to efficiently manage their finances with editable transactions, budgets, and recurring bills.
Provide a seamless inline editing experience inspired by Notion and Excel for quick and intuitive data manipulation.
Ensure full mobile responsiveness and accessibility across devices.
Maintain robust state management to prevent unnecessary data reloads and optimize user interactions.
Support real-time data updates and offline usage with automatic synchronization.
Offer comprehensive data visualization and reporting through charts and monthly reports.
key_features: Recurring Bills Management with inline editing, calendar picker for due date selection, and add/delete operations without page reloads.
Notion/Excel-style inline editing for all editable fields across financial components.
Mobile-first responsive design ensuring full functionality and usability on mobile devices.
Optimized local and server state management enabling immediate updates and optimistic UI without excess API calls.
Financial data visualization using Recharts, including category summaries, monthly reports, and calendar views.
Drag and drop sortable blocks to customize financial dashboards and views.
Offline support via service workers with caching and automatic data sync on reconnect.
Multi-language support with comprehensive internationalization (pt-BR, en, es).
PDF and Excel export capabilities for financial data and reports.
user_flow_summary: User logs in and selects or switches workspace to access finance management features.
User navigates to the Recurring Bills block and can add a new recurring bill using an inline form.
User edits existing recurring bills inline, including name, amount, category, and due day via calendar picker, all without page reloads.
User deletes any recurring bill with immediate UI update and data synchronization.
User accesses financial charts, monthly reports, and category summaries for insights.
User configures budgets and tracks expenses with inline editable tables and inline updates.
User customizes the finance dashboard with drag and drop sortable blocks.
All data changes update local state optimistically and synchronize with the backend asynchronously.
On mobile devices, user accesses all features with touch-optimized controls and a mobile-friendly calendar picker.
validation_criteria: All inline editing fields enter edit mode on click and save changes on blur or Enter key; Escape key cancels editing without reloads.
Users can add, edit, and delete recurring bills without full page reloads; new bills append to the list in creation order.
Calendar picker for due day selection is fully functional and visible on mobile devices with proper touch support.
State updates occur immediately locally with no unnecessary API calls triggered during interactions.
Offline support properly caches data and synchronizes any changes once network is restored.
Financial visualization components render accurately and update in real-time reflecting backend data changes.
All UI elements are responsive and accessible on multiple screen sizes, including mobile breaks at sm, md, and lg.
Keyboard shortcuts and command menus function as designed with accessibility considerations.
Testing coverage includes inline editing, form validation, calendar interaction, state management, event handling, and responsiveness on mobile devices.
